name: To-Do App: The Game
description:
This is an Xcode project for building the game to your own iPhone or iPad.

Also downloadable for free on the iOS App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/to-do-app-the-game/id1111290533?ls=1&mt=8

The latest version will always be available at https://github.com/bitwit/todoappgame
